description: Supply curve GID (Specific to this particular supply curve output)
Supply curve point latitude (deg)
Supply curve point longitude (deg)
Supply curve point county
Supply curve point state
Supply curve point county
Supply curve point elevation (meters)
Supply curve point timezone
Supply curve point GID (Invariant across supply curves)
Supply curve point row GID (Invariant across supply curves)
Supply curve point column GID (Invariant across supply curves)
List of resource GID's mapped to this supply curve point
List of generation GID's mapped to this supply curve point (None for bespoke outputs b/c no generation file exists)
Number of high-resolution cells corresponding to each generation GID for this supply curve point
Total number of not fully excluded pixels associated with the available resource/generation gids
Included-area weighted resource (wind speed, ghi, etc.)  (defaults to `None`)
Included-area weighted AC capacity factor (0-1)
Included-area weighted DC capacity factor (0-1/ILR) (Solar only - defaults to `None` for wind, geothermal, etc)
Included-area weighted resource LCOE ($/Mwh) (based on multi-year mean AEP)
Supply curve point AC capacity (MW) (given both with and solar)
Supply curve point DC capacity (MW) (Solar only - defaults to `None` for wind, geothermal, etc)
Total developable area (km^2)
Tranmission connection feature GID
Transmission connection feature type
Spur line length (km)
Export cable length (Offshore only - defaults to `None` for LBW, solar, geothermal, etc)
Reinforcement distance (km) (defaults to `None`)
Spur line cost ($/MW)
Substation connection/upgrade/installation cost ($/MW)
Export cable costs ($/MW) (Offshore only - defaults to `None`  for LBW, solar, geothermal, etc)
Reinforcement costs ($/MW) (defaults to `None`)
Total transmission capital cost (spur line + export cable (if any) + connection + reinforcement) ($/MW)
LCOT using the total transmission capital cost ($/MWh)
Total LCOE ($/MWh) (Site + Transmission)
Economies of Scale (EOS) multiplier value (defaults to `1` if no EOS curve was specified)
Regional capex multiplier value (defaults to `1` if no "capital_cost_multiplier" value specified)
Total annual energy for supply curve point (MWh) (computed using "capacity_ac_mw" and "capacity_factor_ac")
Spur line POI latitude (deg) (defaults to `None`)
Spur line POI longitude (deg) (defaults to `None`)
Reinforcement POI (substation) latitude (deg) (defaults to `None`)
Reinforcement POI (substation) longitude (deg) (defaults to `None`)
Included-area weighted overnight capital cost with no multipliers ($/MW AC) (defaults to `None` for non-LCOE runs)
Included-area weighted overnight capital cost for supply curve point ($/MW AC) (defaults to `None` for non-LCOE runs)
Included-area weighted fixed operating cost with no multipliers ($/MW AC) (defaults to `None` for non-LCOE runs)
Included-area weighted fixed operating cost for supply curve point ($/MW AC) (defaults to `None` for non-LCOE runs)
Included-area weighted variable operating cost with no multipliers ($/MW AC) (defaults to `None` for non-LCOE runs)
Included-area weighted variable operating cost for supply curve point ($/MW AC) (defaults to `None` for non-LCOE runs)
Fixed charge rate used for LCOE compuation ($/MW AC) (defaults to `None` for non-LCOE runs)
